meanings.definition: A swelling on the underside of the tongue caused by a blocked salivary gland.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with ranulas after examining the swelling under their tongue.
meanings.sent2: Ranulas can be uncomfortable and may require medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The ranulas under his tongue made him sound like he was speaking with a mouthful of marbles.
meanings.sent4: Her ranulas felt like little water balloons under her tongue, ready to burst.
meanings.sent5: The ranulas looked like tiny bubbles trapped beneath the surface of his tongue.
